name: client
description: * This is a simple web application where a client can submit their answers to some of the questions.  * This application contains two interfaces. They are      1. User Interface     2. Admin Interface * Once, when we enter the wesite url in browser, we are directed to the Login page of the website. * If the user has an account, then he/she can directly login to the application. Otherwise, he has to create an account first and then he can login to the application. * If the user logged into the application, then he/she will be directed to the Screening Questions page.There he/she can fill the form and submit it. Once submitted, he can view his responses and then he can logout. * Coming to Admin interface, the admin has to enter http://localhost:4000/admin, then he can view all the responses of the clients.
